text: Tokkel Qimraan Barra Maryam xalte waqdi, diggah Yi-Rabbow Anu Say-Baxá xale itte nadaamitak Yalli is xaltem aaxaguk, Lab- Awkay Anu faxe Say-Awkáh inna hinna, Anu kaa kah faxe Beytal maqhdis taamah usuk fulak teetik Raaqaamih Sabbatah, Diggah Anu Maryamal tet muggaaqiseeh, Diggah Anu tet kee tet Samad (Raddi) Atu isi Racmatak teyxeere Sheytanak koo keenih eleelitaah kay umaanek ken cattam koo essera itte
